description:
Sonia has been given a Gold Cloth to fulfill her duty to Mars; Soma intendeds to fight her one on one to end things once and for all.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La détermination de Sonia. Rompre les chaînes du destin !
Sonia no Kakugo! Innen no Rensa o Tate!
Sonia`s Resolve! Break the Cycle of Fate!
ソニアの覚悟! 因縁の連鎖を断て!
